price: Ɛberε a wɔduruu ne mmienu abͻeε ntεm hɔ no, wͻn werε frii wͻn adwene no, na ͻfaa ne kwan wͻ tokuro bi mu kͻͻ ͻpo no mu maa n’akyi kwan yerae.
arabic: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَا مَجۡمَعَ بَيۡنِهِمَا نَسِيَا حُوتَهُمَا فَٱتَّخَذَ سَبِيلَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ سَرَبٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falammā balaghā majmaʿa baynihimā nasiyā ḥūtahumā fa-ittakhadha sabīlahu fī al-baḥri saraban
